array.string: The Emily Carr campus on Granville Island, an urban park located in the middle of the city.
The bike- and pedestrian-friendly seawall east of Granville Island: cherry blossoms in spring!
Looking north into downtown: imagine taking the ferry to school each day.
Yes, those are palm trees! English Bay looking west to Stanley Park.
Vancouver is very bike friendly. The city has several dedicated bike lanes.
Ocean, beach, mountains and public art â€“ Vancouver has it all.
